exceptions.exn: In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r Hl'' : 2 * l < r u, u1 : nat Hu : u = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) r) Hu1 : u1 = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) w := ∑ (S (power (S l) 2)) (fun i : nat => power i r) : nat u2 := ∑ l (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) : nat H18 : 1 + (r - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) r H19 : u * u = u1 + u2 k := S (power (S l) 2) : nat f := fun i : nat => power (S i) 2 : nat -> nat Hf1 : forall i : nat, i < l -> 2 * f i < k Hf2 : forall i j : nat, i < j < l -> f i < f j Hf3 : forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 <= i1 < l -> j2 <= i2 < l -> f i1 + f j1 = f i2 + f j2 -> i1 = i2 /\\ j1 = j2 H20 : u1 = u * u ⇣ w H21 : u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) H22 : power 2 r + u1 = u + power (power (S l) 2) r H23 : divides (power 4 r) u1 Unable to unify "u * u = u1 + u2" with "u * u = u1 + u * u ⇣ (2 * w)".

In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r Hl'' : 2 * l < r u, u1 : nat Hu : u = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) r) Hu1 : u1 = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) w := ∑ (S (power (S l) 2)) (fun i : nat => power i r) : nat u2 := ∑ l (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) : nat H18 : 1 + (r - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) r H19 : u * u = u1 + u2 k := S (power (S l) 2) : nat f := fun i : nat => power (S i) 2 : nat -> nat Hf1 : forall i : nat, i < l -> 2 * f i < k Hf2 : forall i j : nat, i < j < l -> f i < f j Hf3 : forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 <= i1 < l -> j2 <= i2 < l -> f i1 + f j1 = f i2 + f j2 -> i1 = i2 /\\ j1 = j2 H20 : u1 = u * u ⇣ w H21 : u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) H22 : power 2 r + u1 = u + power (power (S l) 2) r H23 : divides (power 4 r) u1 Unable to unify "u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w)" with "u * u ⇣ (2 * w) = u * u ⇣ (2 * w)".

original: exists w. exists (u * u ⇣ (2 * w)). split. - apply H18. - split. + apply H19. + split. * apply H20. * split. ++ apply H21. ++ split. +++ apply H22. +++ apply H23.
